, one of the primary pilgrimage destinations in Jainism, is located at just 13 km from here, which makes Channarayapatna an important junction for pilgrims visiting that sight. However, the town itself is also a place of considerable religious and historic interest, as there are countless temples in and around the city.
Channarayapatna is located at the intersection of national highway NH 48 and 6 different state highways, making it an important transport hub.
